translation: Vniv, pnah chuhs mngan ṣbḥ kis rb sund. (yʿny tas rb sund yus rạcz hnz tạryky mnz chuh chhạnttith krran rvshn doh).
Prth tamhi chyz kh shr nishhi yus tmụ̄ pạd kvr.
Byyhi rạcz hnzi tạryky nishhi yylhi so vahravnh yiyih. (tikyazi zyadh phn jurm th ẓlm chih rat se mnz spdan, th mvdhy janvr thi chih rat se mnz nyran).
Byyhi (panh) gnddn phokh dinh valyn (ya vajnyn) hndi shri nishhi (murad chih jadvgr mrd th znanh).
Byyhi ḥạsd sndi shr nishhi yylhi suh ḥsd kri. (yʿny yylhi suh ḥsd kis bnyads pytth kanhh nqṣan vatnavnch kvshsh kri).
